tech_news.title: Open world PS5 game Project Windless is part-God of War, part-Dynasty Warriors, and has a veteran Far Cry director as its lead - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Krafton has unveiled open-world fantasy adventure Project Windless for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 5 Pro.

tech_news.title: Castlevania: Belmont's Curse Unveiled For Switch, Launching In 2026 - Nintendo Life
Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 2 revealed for Nintendo Switch 2, Switch - Nintendo Everything
tech_news.description: Konami is working on Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 2, and the company today confirmed plans to release it on Nintendo Switch 2 and Switch. The package comes out on August 27, 2026. Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 2 includes Metal Gear Soli…

tech_news.title: Turns out Game Freak's "relatively small" internal team is supported by "several dozen" development partners for Beast of Reincarnation - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Game Freak has shed a little more light on the "relatively small" internal team working on its upcoming release, Beast of Reincarnation.

tech_news.title: 3 Years Later, John Wick Is Officially Back - Collider
tech_news.description: John Wick is officially back in action, with the first trailer for a new video game bringing Keanu Reeves' action icon back to the spotlight.

tech_news.title: God Of War Trilogy Remake Announced, Brings Back Original Voice Actor - GameSpot
tech_news.description: The next God of War game is not one game but three.

tech_news.title: Legacy of Kain: Ascendance, the First New Legacy of Kain Game in Over Two Decades, Is Out Next Month - IGN
tech_news.description: Crystal Dynamics has revealed the first brand new Legacy of Kain game in over two decades. It's called Legacy of Kain: Ascendance, and it's out sooner than you'd think: on March 31, 2026. That's next month!

tech_news.title: PlayStation Plus Game Catalog and Classics Catalog lineup for February 2026 announced - Gematsu
tech_news.description: Sony Interactive Entertainment has announced the February 2026 Game Catalog lineup for Extra and Premium subscribers, and Classics Catalog titles for Premium subscribers.

tech_news.title: ‘Marathon’ Announces Free Open Beta Release Date, And It’s A Bit Late - Forbes
tech_news.description: Bungie has announced the dates for Marathon's free open beta preview test, and it's going to be pretty late in the game.

tech_news.title: Silent Hill: Townfall launches in 2026 for PS5, PC; reveal trailer - Gematsu
tech_news.description: Silent Hill: Townfall will launch in 2026 for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, publishers Konami and Annapurna Interactive, and developer Screen Burn Interactive announced.
